name: Jetman Go
description: Engage in multiplayer gunfights that you are free to fly in the sky play like no FPS you've played before. you can choose 4 guns with a totally level playing field and 18 beautiful maps with different strategies. Equip your jetpack and Fight in the sky!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
